repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:alpine 
WORKDIR /usr/src/app 
# adds all static files which were pre built 
ADD ./dist/ /usr/src/app 
ADD ./server.js /usr/src/app 
# installing all needed dependencies 
RUN npm install express && npm install ejs && npm cache clean --force;
ENV PORT=8080 
EXPOSE 8080 
CMD [ "node", "server.js" ]
